amendment.description: To end the mailbox use monopoly.

action.text: Amendment SA 2025 proposed by Senator Paul to Amendment SA 2000.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2025, under the order of 4/19/2012, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 35 - 64. Record Vote Number: 76.
